definition: someone who is morally reprehensible, to use foul or abusive language towards
details:
noun
- someone who is morally reprehensible
= synonyms: hound
verb
- to use foul or abusive language towards
= example: to use foul or abusive language towards
= synonyms: abuse
- to subject to laughter or ridicule
= example: to subject to laughter or ridicule
= synonyms: ridicule
